enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve initializing an iterator and setting up the state for iteration.
Both methods require validating the input iterator to ensure it is not null.
Setting up a PeekingIterator involves initializing the iterator and preparing the lookahead slot, which can be abstracted into a setup method.
The method checks if the provided iterator is already a PeekingIterator and handles it accordingly, which can be a separate utility method.
